contentList.content: You are resistant to Bludgeoning damage.
The creature you touch is branded with a Daedric inscription, granting them resistance to all Bludgeoning damage for 10 minutes.
Healing energy surrounds you, restoring your health by [1].
This character is currently concentrating on the Healing Hands spell.
As long as you are affected, the caster of Healing Hands may Heal you using Healing Hands without using a Spell Slot.

Golden strands of magicka flow from your hands, restoring your target's health by [1]. By concentrating on this spell, you may continue to heal the initial target without using a Spell Slot for the duration of the spell.
Golden strands of magicka flow from your hands, restoring your target's health by [1] for each turn you stay in melee range.
For the duration of the spell, you are resistant to Poisons.
